experiences.description:
Responsibilities: 
• Prepared and analyzed System Requirements Specifications (SRS) for a project and interactedwith client during requirements specifications. 
• Implemented and enhanced CRUD operations for the applications using the MVC (Model ViewController) architecture framework. 
• Developed microservices to increase productivity, quality and security. 
• Created most important Business Rules which are useful for the scope of project and needs ofcustomers. 
• Developed and tested many features for dashboard using Ruby on Rails, Bootstrap, CSS andJavaScript. 
• Planned and carried out daily scrums, weekly estimations and retrospectives and pairprogramming. 
• Followed Test Driven Development (TDD), Scrum concepts of the Agile Methodology to producehigh Quality Software. 
• Practiced Test-Driven Development with RSpec as well as Behavior Driven Development withCucumber and Capybara to specify and test controller classes, models, view templates, helpersand routing. 
• User Interface for website with ERB, JQuery, html, css, Ajax in Ruby on Rails Framework. 
• Used Extreme Programming (XP) and Scrum practices. 
• Developed ETL workflows involving Data extraction, serialization, transformations and loadinginto mongodb. 
• Involved in creating and maintaining Database objects, Profiles and associated tablespaces, Rolesand Privileges. 
• Used AMQP for messaging protocol. 
• Have exposer in building containers using Docker. 
• Used JQuery, Angularjs, Reactjs and Ajax in web applications to enhance the customer websiteexperience. 
• Design and maintain ROR code. Implement upgrades, patches, code releases, and databasechanges using Mongo DB (NoSQL) 
• Peer-review code to satisfy quality, stability, performance, DRY patterns and security checklist. 
• Wrote ruby scripts for deployments onto AWS and Continuous Integration provisioning. 
• Analyzed software requirements and provide solutions and performed analysis, design, coding,testing, implementation, and maintenance of software solutions.
experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer / Ruby on Rails Developer

experiences.description:
Responsibilities: 
• Developed web application using Ruby on Rails on Unix/Linux operating system, backed byMySQL, and PostgreSQL. 
• Planned and carried out daily scrums, weekly estimations and retrospectives and pairprogramming. 
• Involved in Software Development which is driven by Agile methodology. 
• Develop user friendly and sophisticated graphical representation of the catalogue of items thatwould be configured for a piece of equipment. 
• Design and implementation of MVC framework using technologies like JavaScript, HTML, CSS,and RUBY on RAILS. 
• Upgraded associated gems, across multiple Ruby and Rails versions. 
• Implemented Behavior Driven Deployment (BDD) using R spec and Cucumber to perform crossbrowser and regression testing. 
• Execute lossless data migrations in production from a MySQL database to a redesignedPostgreSQL database. 
• ETL: Data extraction, managing, aggregations and loading into Hive. 
• Used Talend to perform ETL jobs. 
• Implemented Big Data tools within Hadoop ecosystem (HDFS, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie). 
• Created Hive External tables and loaded the data into tables and queried data using HQL thathelped market analysts to look for emerging trends by comparing fresh data with EDW referencetables. 
• Used Hive to analyze the partitioned and bucketed data and compute various metrics forreporting. 
• Worked closely with other developers, project managers, UX designers, and marketers on agileuser stories.
experiences.title: Software Developer

experiences.description:
Responsibilities: 
• Involved in various phases of Software development life cycle (SDLC) as requirement gathering,modeling, analysis, architecture design & development. 
• Designed and developed web applications using Ruby, Rails, Java/J2EE design patterns, HTML,CSS, Java Script AJAX and JQuery. 
• Designed and developed necessary UML Diagrams (Use Case, Class, Sequence, State). 
• Responsibilities included developing new features, fixing bugs, interfacing with the productdevelopment and software quality assurance group. 
• Developed custom Rails applications specific to client's unique needs. 
• Database modeling and design. Involved in developing and implementation of the webapplication using Ruby on Rails. 
• Participated in requirements definition and story carding. 
• Worked extensively with arrays and hashes in the ruby environment. 
• Used many regular expressions in order to match the pattern with the existing one. 
• Designed, development controller and view part of the system by scaffolding. 
• Understanding of how web applications work including security, session management and bestdevelopment practices. 
• Focus on Ruby development, both inside of a traditional Rails application, and as part of a reportgenerating application. 
• Developed the user authentication and order processing modules for customer facingapplication. 
• Develop user friendly and sophisticated graphical representation of the catalogue of items thatwould be configured for a piece of equipment. 
• Responsible for most view/controller changes, as well as model/database integration with othermembers of team. 
• Developed cross-browser/platform using HTML, CSS, JQuery and JavaScript to match designspecs for complex page layouts while adhering to code standards 
• Deployed application and provide continuous maintenance using Git. 
• Developed Session Beans to process user requests and Entity Beans to load and storeinformation from database. 
• Designed and used JUnit test cases during the development phase. 
• Used Tortoise SVN for version control of the source code. 
• Open source cross-platform WebTesting (WSDL) using SoapUI. 
• Designed and implemented relational database, and stored procedures, views, and triggersusing MS SQL server development tool.
experiences.title: Senior Programmer Analyst
